slides.title: Record Store Database
slides.desc: Simulation of a inventory database, complete with user authentication and administrative restrictions.

slides.title: Tkinter Application Developer
slides.desc: Simplifying Tkinter-based application development for inexperienced coders.

slides.title: Relational Database Model
slides.desc: Simulation of a large-scale relational database and analyzing SQL relational commands for user queries.

slides.title: Dijkstra's Path Finder
slides.desc: Optimizes and finds the shortest path of directions from one point to another on large-scale maps, using Dijkstra's algorithm.

slides.title: Logistic Regression Trainer
slides.desc: Trained data with logistic regression, developing and implementing a stochastic gradient descent algorithm, alongside a visualization of results.

slides.title: Music Searcher
slides.desc: Exploration of music and artists using Last.fm's REST API. Read artist biographies, view top songs, and find similar artists.

slides.title: Molez
slides.desc: A fast-paced Whack-a-mole mobile game, complete with extra time power-ups.
